original_text: ‘Babylon's people have caused the death of people everywhere. They have killed many Israelites. So now Babylon must lose its power. ‘Babylon's people have caused the death of people everywhere. They have killed many Israelites. So now Babylon must lose its power. ‘Babylon's people have caused the death of people everywhere. They have killed many Israelites. So now Babylon must lose its power. ‘Babylon's people have caused the death of people everywhere. They have killed many Israelites. So now Babylon must lose its power. ‘Babylon's people have caused the death of people everywhere. They have killed many Israelites. So now Babylon must lose its power. ‘Babylon's people have caused the death of people everywhere.
korean_text: 바벨론이 이스라엘을 죽여 엎드러뜨림 같이 온 세상이 바벨론에서 죽임을 당하여 엎드러지리라

sentences.original_text: Babylon's people have caused the death of people everywhere.
sentences.korean_translation: 바빌론 사람들이 세상 곳곳에서 사람들의 죽음을 초래했다.

sentences.original_text: So now Babylon must lose its power.
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 이제 바빌론은 그 권력을 잃어야 한다.

sentences.original_text: Babylon's people have caused the death of people everywhere.
